# Technic

A trading technical analysis library for python.

## Dependencies

1. pandas
2. numpy

## Supported Technical Functions

| Indicator             | Status      |
| --------------------- | ----------- |
| SMA                   | DONE        |
| EMA                   | DONE        |
| RSI                   | DONE        |
| ATR                   | DONE        |
| STD                   | DONE        |
| MACD                  | DONE        |
| BOLLINGER BANDS       | DONE        |
| KELTNER CHANNELS      | DONE        |
| SQUEEEZE              | COMING SOON |
| STOCHASTIC OSCILLATOR | COMING SOON |
